title: Opinion: STAT+: Sometimes, it would be unethical not to use AI in medicine
description: “We do not let pilots fly without instrument support simply because they technically could. Why should medicine be different?”
content: “We do not let pilots fly without instrument support simply because they technically could. Why should medicine be different?”
